contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox sportsperson |birth_date={{Birth date and age|1972|06|05}} |medaltemplates={{MedalSport | Men's [[Wrestling at the Summer Olympics|Greco-Roman wrestling]]}} {{MedalGold| [[1996 Summer Olympics|1996 Atlanta]] | [[Wrestling at the 1996 Summer Olympics|Bantamweight]]}} }} '''Yuriy Melnichenko''' (born June 5, 1972) is a [[Kazakhs|Kazakh]] [[sport wrestling|wrestler]]. At the [[1996 Summer Olympics]] he won the gold medal in the men's Greco-Roman Bantamweight (52â€“57 kg) category.<ref>{{cite news|url=http://sportsillustrated.cnn.com/events/1996/olympics/daily/july22/wrest.html|title=Thrown For a Loss|date=July 26, 2006|publisher=[[Sports Illustrated]]|accessdate=23 November 2009}}</ref> ==References== <references/> ==External links== *[http://www.nbcolympics.com/athletes/athlete=77880/bio/ NBC Olympic Profile - Yuriy Melnichenko] {{Footer Asian Games Champions Wrestling Greco-Roman Bantamweight Men}} {{Persondata | NAME = Melnichenko, Yuriy | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION =Olympic wrestler | DATE OF BIRTH = June 5, 1972 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Melnichenko, Yuriy}} [[Category:Kazakhstani sport wrestlers]] [[Category:1972 births]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:Wrestlers at the 1996 Summer Olympics]] [[Category:Olympic wrestlers of Kazakhstan]] [[Category:Olympic gold medalists for Kazakhstan]] [[Category:Olympic medalists in wrestling]] [[Category:Asian Games medalists in wrestling]] {{Kazakhstan-Olympic-medalist-stub}} {{Kazakhstan-wrestling-bio-stub}}
